p: Guangzhou, the capital city of Guangdong province, is the third most populous city in China. At the end of 2014 the population in Guangzhou was 13.1 million [ 33]. This city is the center of transportation, finance, industry and trade in southern China and has a large exchange in business and tourism with southeast Asia, Africa and the Indian subcontinent. It has 12 districts with an area of 7473 km 2 and a typical subtropical monsoon climate, with an annual mean temperature of 22Â°C.
